projects.title: Crafting Magic in San Francisco
projects.about: What does it take to build an AI startup in the heart of San Francisco? Monthly mini-docs from the sync. headquarters featuring raw stories of failure and success throughout the journey. View all the videos in the series here.
projects.videoEmbed: <iframe src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/cgzhchOediw?iv_load_policy=3&rel=0&modestbranding=1&playsinline=1&autoplay=0&mute=1" data-thumbnail="Medium Quality" frameborder="0" allow="presentation; fullscreen; accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture"></iframe>
projects.otherInfo1:
Our Involvement

The Crafting Magic series is directed, filmed, and edited by Muhammad Hadi Yusufali. In addition to capturing and creating these videos, Awaiten also is in charge of behind-the-scenes photography at the sync. headquarters. You can view all our work at gallery.awaiten.com.
projects.otherInfo2:
About sync.

Telling great stories shouldn't be hard. At sync.labs, we're building tools to create, animate, and understand humans in video, made by the founders of wav2lip. Built by creators, for creators. Craft magic at sync.so

projects.title: Alif Summit: The Documentary
projects.about: A documentary film capturing the essence and events of the Alif Summit.

projects.title: The Story of Camp Noor
projects.about: Team Awaiten partnered with the yearly Camp Noor event in 2024 to document the camp and the journey of the attendees. With over 4 days of content, Awaiten then worked with Journey Tellers to create a documentary from this experience.
projects.videoEmbed: <iframe src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/zkvAHvcw8DE?iv_load_policy=3&rel=0&modestbranding=1&playsinline=1&autoplay=0&mute=1" data-thumbnail="Medium Quality" frameborder="0" allow="presentation; fullscreen; accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture"></iframe>
projects.otherInfo1:
In the World

Journey Tellers In The World is a series by Awaiten with a focus on short-form documentaries. The goal of each project is to tell a story of an event happening within the Muslim community; showing the process from idea to execution, the audience's reaction, and the experience as a whole.
projects.otherInfo2:
Learn more

Learn more about Camp Noor at campnoor.org, or visit their Instagram by clicking here.

To learn more about Journey Tellers, visit awaiten.com/podcast. To view all the videos in the Journey Tellers In The World series, click here.

projects.title: Bay Area's Annual Suhoor Fest
projects.about: Team Awaiten partnered with HalalFest, Inc. to capture the 25,000+ attendee official Bay Area Suhoor Fest of 2024. Services included ground and drone videography. Working with Journey Tellers, Awaiten then created a documentary about this event, which can be viewed below.

projects.title: Mosque Fundraising Ad Campaign
projects.about: After the California storms during Winter 2023, the Islamic Center of Alameda faced damage to their mosque and were in need of funding to renovate the mosque, creating a center for future generations. After reaching out to Awaiten, we worked with their team to bring their vision to life, through multiple videography shoots and a promotional campaign to raise funds.
projects.videoEmbed: <iframe src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/_Xdcd8-Nj2M?iv_load_policy=3&rel=0&modestbranding=1&playsinline=1&autoplay=0&mute=1" data-thumbnail="Medium Quality" frameborder="0" allow="presentation; fullscreen; accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture"></iframe>
projects.otherInfo1:
Learn more

Learn more about the Islamic Center of Alameda by clicking here.

projects.title: SABA Islamic Center
projects.about: Promotional videos and photography for SABA Islamic Center in the Bay Area.
projects.content:
About the project

The Awaiten team had the chance to work with SABA Islamic Center, a mosque in the Bay Area, for three years. Awaiten provided a wide range of multimedia services, including promotional videos, event photography and event videography in collaboration with the Guest Services department.



Learn more

Learn more about SABA Islamic Center and it's initiatives by visiting their website.

projects.title: Bridal Shower at Valley Oak Farm
projects.thumbnailAlt: Bridal Shower at Valley Oak Farm
projects.about: In May 2024, Decor in a Box reached out to the Awaiten team to request the documentation of an upcoming event in partnership with the Valley Oak Farm in Morgan Hill. Services requested included location and setup photography of a bridal shower, gimbal videography, drone videography, photo post-processing, and video editing.
projects.videoEmbed: <iframe src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/NutzsccEySw?iv_load_policy=3&rel=0&modestbranding=1&playsinline=1&autoplay=0&mute=1" data-thumbnail="Medium Quality" frameborder="0" allow="presentation; fullscreen; accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture"></iframe>
projects.content:
Photography



Learn more

View the latest work from Decor in a Box on Instagram.

projects.title: The Best Sandwiches in Town
projects.about: Ad campaign and promotional video creation for Halalwich.
projects.content:
About the project

Awaiten worked with Halalwich to create a promotional video and ad campaign for their small business. The team provided videography and photography services, along with a final edited promotional video. In addition, Awaiten provided the raw footage, including high-quality shots for promotional pictures and short clips for social media. Awaiten's goal was to capture the essence of the restaurant’s offerings, highlighting the unique appeal of their sandwiches.


Client review

We had the team come out and shoot us a video for our small business. The guys showed up prepared with a bunch of equipment and ready to go. Their instructions were very clear, and had great ideas of their visions for the video. They were very flexible and understanding of our situation and space and made it all work. Even though our toddler was crying for my wife and not letting them shoot, they still managed to work around that and produce a video that impressed us. We had no idea how good our food looked until we saw the video. I am grateful for their honest professional service and will be sure to use them for the future marketing projects. I have already referred them to other businesses as well.

Mahdi Falahati, Head Chef and CEO


Photography


Promotional Video


Learn more

Learn more about Halalwich, view it's menu, and see upcoming events by clicking here.

projects.title: Journey Tellers Podcast
projects.about: Production of the Journey Tellers podcast, sharing stories from the Muslim West.
projects.content:
About the project

Reading & writing the story of the Muslim West; Journey Tellers is a podcast created by Muhammad Hadi Yusufali and Ali Almathkur, produced by Awaiten Films. Entrepreneurs, chefs, doctors, animators, converts, dropouts, educators—Journey Tellers believes that everyone has a story to share, no matter their fame or level of "success".



Learn more

To learn more about Journey Tellers, visit journeytellers.org. Find the latest podcast episode on YouTube, Spotify, or any other major podcast streaming platform. You can also find Journey Tellers on Instagram.

projects.title: Music Production: Reed of Tawheed
projects.about: Music production and video creation for Reed of Tawheed.
projects.content:
About the project

During the summer of 2021, M Hadi from Awaiten partnered with Mahdi Falahati to form Reed of Tawheed. Under Al-Kisa Foundation, the goal of Reed of Tawheed was to create a form of music that followed Islamic guidelines and mourned historical figures, celebrated religion, and spread the truth about Islam. Team Awaiten produced each episode, working with the pre-production, audio, and distribution teams to ensure high quality productions.

Media

Learn more

View all of Reed of Tawheed's projects on the Al-Kisa Foundation YouTube channel, or on Spotify here.

projects.title: The Wondertime Show Production
projects.about: Co-production of The Wondertime Show episodes for Kisa Kids.
projects.content:
About the project

Team Awaiten co-produced episodes and live streams of The Wondertime Show, alongside Al-Kisa Foundation. The goal of The Wondertime Show was to create a form of entertainment for kids that followed religious guidelines and was educational, while remaining appealing and entertaining. This approach allowed for the episodes to reach tens of thousands of views, and create a dedicated fanbase that lasted for years.

Media

Learn more

  • View all of The Wondertime Show seasons on the Kisa Kids YouTube channel.

  • Learn more about Al-Kisa Foundation by clicking here.

projects.title: Wedding Ceremonies
projects.about: Wedding photography services capturing the special moments of the big day.
projects.content:
About the project

In June 2024, a family reached out to the Awaiten team to request wedding photography services. Awaiten worked with the family to provide coverage of the event, along with additional photography of the bride and groom. Awaiten then processed each picture in post, replacing green screen backgrounds and coloring the pictures to perfection.



Green Screen Photography

projects.title: RISE Graduation Ceremonies
projects.about: Photography coverage for RISE Academy graduation ceremonies.
projects.content:
About the project

Awaiten Films was the exclusive team in charge of photography of all four of RISE Academy's 2024 graduation ceremonies. RISE, a Cognia-certified K-12 school in the Bay Area, worked with Team Awaiten to bring their visions to life, capturing the highlights of the Early Childhood Education, 6th Grade, 8th Grade, and 12th Grade graduations.

Client review

"Awaiten Films did a fantastic job at our school's graduation and promotion ceremonies. They captured all the key moments beautifully. The photographers were professional, punctual, and easy to work with, accommodating all our requests. Their friendly approach made everyone feel at ease. The quick delivery and high-quality photos were much appreciated. I highly recommend them for any event.

Sahar Akbarzadeh, Operations Director at RISE Academy


12th Grade Graduation


8th Grade Graduation


Learn more

Learn more about RISE Academy by clicking here.

projects.title: RISE Senior Portraits
projects.about: Senior portrait photography sessions for RISE Academy students.
projects.content:
About the project

In May 2024, the Awaiten team was contacted with a request to provide senior portrait photography for RISE Academy. Working closely with the school, Awaiten provided an opportunity for students to receive high quality portraits with multiple background and clothing options. The team also provided an option for the portraits to be printed, with multiple size options available.


Client reviews

Excellent service. Photographers worked efficiently and were very patient. The whole process was a breeze as they prepared well for the shoot. Highly recommend.

Isa T, Student

The team was easy and fun to work with! Everyone had a keen eye for what looked best for the client. Jokes and funny moments were brought here and there, which made the photoshoot memorable. Thank you!

Ruqayya Z, Student



Learn more

Learn more about RISE Academy by clicking here.

projects.title: Berkeley Graduation Portraits
projects.about: Personalized graduation portraits for UC Berkeley graduates.
projects.content:
About the project

In April and May 2024, Aalyan from Team Awaiten offered professional graduation portraits for University of California, Berkeley students. The team provided a personalized experience, allowing graduates to select their own outfits and choose from multiple backgrounds. Photo shoots lasted anywhere from an hour to three hours, and options were also provided for group photography (i.e. the graduating student with friends). Awaiten also offered various print sizes, ensuring students could share their achievements with loved ones.


Client reviews

I had an amazing graduation shoot! The photos were exactly what I was hoping for, and I had a fun time trying different poses and spots. Wouldn't choose anyone else :)

Sima A



Learn more

View Aalyan's full portfolio by clicking here.

projects.title: LUMOS Photoshoots
projects.about: Fashion and brand photography for the LUMOS humanitarian initiative.
projects.content:
About the project

During the fall of 2023, LUMOS was an initiative to sell hoodies to support humanitarian causes and raise funds to help saves lives. Directed by Muhammad Hadi Yusufali, photography and videography was led by Awaiten Films, and featured a diverse set of models.
